thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PLUS Delmere Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location and very modern
thread.title_full: Great Location and very modern - Review of BEST WESTERN PLUS Delmere Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Pam T
title: Great Location and very modern
text: Love to stay here while stopping in London. The location provides fast and easy access to London Paddington. The rooms are quite small but very much adequate. I am not there to spend time in my room! I just need a place to lay my head at night. When in London, I want o experience much of the city. Very modern, clean and great staff
